Judul: Probability of frame synchronisation failure for binary and complex-valued sequences
Abstrak:
Several different sequences for frame
synchronisation have been published in the literature.
Recently, even sequences using complex
signal alphabets have been specified. Whether
binary or complex, they are always chosen according
to the properties of their autocorrelation function.
However, the probability of being out of
synchronisation has not as such been considered
sufficiently. The paper serves as a compendium
of derivations of such probability formulas for
various applications and conditions, including
both binary and complex signal constellations.
Hard quantisation as well as the continuous case
are treated.
Kata Kunci: Codes and decoding, Digital communication systems
